definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: I am Secretary of Shandong Province is currently the largest container bags, one ton bags manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 我司是山東省目前最大的集裝袋，噸袋生產廠家之一。

sentences.english: Remove the lettuce from its store packaging. Then, wrap it in paper toweling, and place it in an open storage bag.
sentences.chinese: 往掉生菜包裝，用廚房紙包好，放進打開的包裝袋中。

sentences.english: Those stacks can then be sent to automatic baggers or onto conveyors.
sentences.chinese: 然後這些堆積將送往自動裝袋機或傳送機。

sentences.english: The labels on the cargos are false.
sentences.chinese: 這些包裝袋內的貨物是壓碎的。

sentences.english: Multiply paper sacks can be filled to customer's specific requirements to facilitate batch charging.
sentences.chinese: 還可以根據碎漿機的裝鍋量，按客戶的要求裝袋包裝。

sentences.english: This batch of your products have a problem: all of the package bags were broken at the sealing area.
sentences.chinese: 這批次的產品全部在包裝袋的封口處呈現破包問題。

sentences.english: Do you think the text on the nutrition chart is too small for you?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲包裝袋上的字對你來說過小了麼？

sentences.english: He said the potato peeling packages may appear on shelves within 18 months.
sentences.chinese: 他表示，土豆皮做成的包裝袋將於18個月內面市。

sentences.english: There is a list of ingredients on the side of the packet.
sentences.chinese: 包裝袋的邊上印有所含配料表。

sentences.english: Rinse fish after removing its packaging and pat dry with a paper towel.
sentences.chinese: 拆掉包裝袋後把魚沖洗乾淨然後用紙巾把水拍幹。

sentences.english: You wash and reuse ziplock bags.
sentences.chinese: 你把壓縮包裝袋洗了再用。

sentences.english: Remove the print cartridge from the bag .
sentences.chinese: 從包裝袋中取出打印碳粉盒。

sentences.english: I got hired one summer to sack grain.
sentences.chinese: 有一年夏季，我受僱替人把糧食裝袋。

sentences.english: Never eat directly out of the bag, box, or carton.
sentences.chinese: 不要從包裝袋，包裝盒當中取出食物直接食用。

sentences.english: Folds the product loads in the sack and with some mothballs when no using.
sentences.chinese: 不使用時將產品摺好裝入包裝袋內並放入少量衛生球。

sentences.english: A personal shopper pulls imperfect red grapes from a bunch. She is bagging for a customer.
sentences.chinese: 一名導購員將不好的紅葡萄揪下，她正在給顧客裝袋。

definition: to reconstitute (a powdered beverage) by adding water, milk etc
